metadata.title: CVE-2020-22628 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability in LibRaw::stretch() function inlibraw\src\postprocessing\aspect_ratio.cpp.

criterions.comment: libraw: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
